searchAlgo

Class Dijkstra

  • java.lang.Object
    • searchAlgo.Dijkstra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchAlgo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Astar

    public class Dijkstra
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchAlgo
    Dijkstra's algorithm for shortest route finding. Uses a custom-made MinHeap as a support data structure.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dijkstra(Graph graph)
      Initialise search algorithm with a graph.
